data.quote: Never give up, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
data.author: Harriet B. Stow

data.quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough
data.author: Og Mandino

data.quote: Every great story on the planet happened when someone decided not to give up, but kept going no matter what
data.author: Spryte Loriano

data.quote: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will... you definitely won't reach your dreams if you don't try!
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: A life spent making mistakes is not only more honorable but more useful than a life spent doing nothing.
data.author: George B. Shaw

data.quote: The whole secret of a successful life is to find out what is oneâ€™s destiny to do, and then do it.
data.author: Henry Ford

data.quote: Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out
data.author: John Wooden

data.quote: The Only thing that overcomes hard luck is hard work.
data.author: Harry Golden
